text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ وَٱلنَّصَٰرَىٰ وَٱلصَّٰبِـِٔينَ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ
translation: 62. Diggah tama ummatak (Nabii Mucammad ﷺ kataate mara kinnuk) yeemeneh yan maraay, yahuud yekke maraa kee Nasaaraay Saabi-iin deqsita marak Yallaa kee ellecaboh Ayro Nummayseeh meqe taamoomi Abbaasite mari, toysa usun sinni Rabbih xaqul sinni galto-lon, Akeeral meesi ken Amol matanaay Addunyak keenik warrayteemih marookitan, kinnih immay Nabii Mucammad ﷺ rubsumeek lakal Yalli isla am diinik kalih diini hebeltö numuk moggola.
